means: 参加电台、电视节目的演出

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"宣布，公开"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: announce, declare, proclaim, pronounce, advertise, broadcast, publish
means: announce ：多指首次宣布大家感兴趣或可满足大家好奇心的事情。
declare ：侧重正式就某事清楚明白地宣布。
proclaim ：指官方宣布重大事件或施政方针，语体比announce正式。
pronounce ：词义与announce, declare接近，但较多用于指法律判决方面的宣布。
advertise ：指通过文字和图像资料等的反复宣传而引起公众的注意，有时隐含令人不快或言过其实的意味。
broadcast ：专指利用广播或电视传播消息或发表见解。
publish ：专指通过报刊或其它媒介向公众公布事情。

word_mean: （1）信息发送到网上所有的节点。 （2）通过无线或有线方式传送信息的大众传播媒介。

sentence.Network_cn: 新闻广播准确可靠但却非常枯燥。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (in the sense 'sown by scattering'): from broad + the past participle of cast

entry.tran: （无线电或电视）广播；广播节目；电视节目
entry.def: A broadcast is a programme, performance, or speech on the radio or on television.

example.ex: In a broadcast on state radio the government also announced that it was willing to resume peace negotiations.
example.tran: 在国家电台的广播中，政府也声明愿意重新开始和平谈判。

entry.tran: （电台或电视台）广播，播出（节目）
entry.def: To broadcast a programme means to send it out by radio waves, so that it can be heard on the radio or seen on television.

example.ex: The concert will be broadcast live on television and radio...
example.tran: 音乐会将通过电视和广播现场直播。
美国有线新闻网也在欧洲播出节目。

means.word_mean: 1. message that is transmitted by radio or television

sentences.sentence: "did you see his program last night?"

means.word_mean: 1. broadcast over the airwaves, as in radio or television;
2. sow over a wide area, especially by hand;

broad宽广+cast投射→n.广播, 播音
broadcast[n.广播, 播音]+ing状态→n.广播

sentences.en: Do you listen to the broadcast?

sentences.cn: 他进行过多次广播节目。

means.word_mean: 广播, 播放.播送（电视或无线电节目）

sentences.en: They broadcast this hour every day.
sentences.cn: 他们每天这个时间播音。

sentences.en: The radio broadcast the news in detail.
sentences.cn: 无线电台详细地广播了那则消息。

sentences.en: She broadcast the gossip all over the town.
sentences.cn: 她将这个流言传遍全镇。

jushi.english: Some stations broadcast 24 hours of the day.
jushi.chinese: 有些电台一天24小时广播。

jushi.english: The BBC broadcasts to all parts of the world every day.
jushi.chinese: 英国广播公司每天对世界的所有地区广播。

jushi.english: The Prime Minister will broadcast this evening.
jushi.chinese: 首相将于今晚发表广播演说。
